questions.question: Print your name to the console.
Print the result of adding 5 and 7.
Print three variables: name, age, and city.
questions.answer:
name = 'John'
age = 25
city = 'New York'
print(name, age, city)

questions.question: Print a message welcoming the user with their entered name.
questions.answer:
user_name = input('Enter your name: ')
print('Welcome, ' + user_name + '!'')

questions.question: Print the area of a rectangle with length 10 and width 5.
questions.answer:
length = 10
width = 5
area = length * width
print('Area of the rectangle:', area)

Print the square of the number 9.

questions.answer: print('This is a message with single quotes and "double quotes".')
